name: Exercise Images by Everkinetic
author: Greg Priday

sections.description:
If you have a fitness related blog, then Everkinetic is what you’re looking for. It gives you access to Everkinetic’s growing database of exercise images.

This plugin lets you browser Everkinetic and insert images into your posts all in your WordPress admin.

How It Works

This plugin adds a button. This button opens up Everkinetic and its exercise images in an iframe modal. You can browse the exercises or search for the exact one you need.

Clicking “Insert Exercise” will add an exercise shortcode to your content.

After you save your content, the plugin will get the exercise information and images from Everkinetic and store them in your WordPress content folder. If WordPress can’t create the images, they’ll be delivered from our global CDN.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin.
  2. You’ll now have a small button in your content editor that lets you add exercises.
sections.changelog:

  • Removed unused settings file.

  • Initial release on WordPress.org theme directory.
